solution_line_template: Each bag of oranges weighs {total_weight_12_bags} pounds / {num_bags_12} = <<{total_weight_12_bags}/{num_bags_12}={weight_per_bag}>>{weight_per_bag} pounds.
{num_bags_8} bags of oranges would weigh {num_bags_8} * {weight_per_bag} pounds = <<{num_bags_8}*{weight_per_bag}={weight_8_bags}>>{weight_8_bags} pounds.
